body_html:
@gopi77 - Is there a reason why you are running ./configure as sudo? Can you try running it without sudo?

@Dapid @nsuke - Can one of you apply the patch I linked in my comment above, reproduce the failure, and paste the output that you get as described so that we can get some more state on why the error is happening?
body_text:
@gopi77 - Is there a reason why you are running ./configure as sudo? Can you try running it without sudo?
@Dapid @nsuke - Can one of you apply the patch I linked in my comment above, reproduce the failure, and paste the output that you get as described so that we can get some more state on why the error is happening?
body:
@gopi77 - Is there a reason why you are running `./configure` as sudo? Can you try running it without sudo?

@Dapid @nsuke - Can one of you apply the patch I linked in [my comment above](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/4105#issuecomment-244868298), reproduce the failure, and paste the output that you get as described so that we can get some more state on why the error is happening?
